structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Sales to persons illegally selling malt beverages prohibited.
law.text: No person shall sell any malt beverage to any person engaged in selling malt beverages in violation of the provisions of KRS Chapters 242, 243 and 244.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-211.
